text:
With rapid population growth and 
unsustainable practices by 2030

we're projected to experience a 40% shortfall in 
fresh water. I'm Stanford Professor Will Tarpeh,

and in my new course I will demystify the world 
of water management and chemical manufacturing.

Together we'll explore the promise of circular 
economies and reveal the pivotal roles that

water plays from producing fuels and fertilizers 
to making the very water that we consume every

day. Unlock the future of water treatment 
by diving into the groundbreaking realm of

electrochemical wastewater refining. We'll 
also immerse ourselves in Innovative realms

of on-site treatment and autonomous 
sensing. Join me, Professor William

Tarpeh and let's embark together on a path 
of discovery innovation and sustainability.
